sentences.english: The city has been painted up for the Spring Festival.
sentences.chinese: 为欢度春节市容已修饰一新。

sentences.english: It also manages amenity plots and soft landscape along highways and roads.
sentences.chinese: 该局又护理市容地带及公路沿线的美化环境植物。

sentences.english: Beijing's facelift will attract a lot more non-Olympic related investment.
sentences.chinese: 另外，北京的市容改善也会吸引更多非奥运项目投资。

sentences.english: Article 10 This Municipality adopts the system of responsibility zones of city appearance and environmental sanitation.
sentences.chinese: 第十条本市实行市容环境卫生责任区制度。

sentences.english: On one side of the coin, Beijing's facelift will attract a lot more non-Olympic related investment.
sentences.chinese: 另外，北京的市容改善也会吸引更多非奥运项目投资。

sentences.english: Her apartment on the tenth floor has a fine view of the city.
sentences.chinese: 她十楼的公寓房子有很好的市容景观。

sentences.english: At the top there was a cafe and a balcony where visitors could stand and enjoy the view.
sentences.chinese: 塔顶有一个咖啡厅和观光平台，游客可以俯瞰市容。

sentences.english: However, they were considered inappropriate for Beijing and were replaced with new models.
sentences.chinese: 后来这种车型被认为有碍京城市容而被新车型取代。

sentences.english: City visage is the restrictive factor of Chongqing city identity building.
sentences.chinese: 关于重庆城市市容市貌建设。

sentences.english: At weekends, Mr. Wang, his old friend, often shows him around the city.
sentences.chinese: 到了周未他的老朋友王先生经常带他去观光市容。

sentences.english: The old city is increasingly disfigured by tasteless new buildings.
sentences.chinese: 这座老城的市容越来越多地被庸俗的新建筑物破坏了。

sentences.english: He said that Beijing's cityscape and air quality have improved since then.
sentences.chinese: 他说，北京的市容和空气质量也大为改善。

definition: local government bylaw enforcement officer/city management (abbr. for 城市管理行政執法局|城市管理行政执法局[Cheng2 shi4 Guan3 li3 Xing2 zheng4 Zhi2 fa3 ju2])
environmental sanitation/abbr. to 環衛|环卫[huan2 wei4]
abbr. for 違章建築|违章建筑, illegal construction
to make green with plants/to reforest/(Internet slang) Islamization
public cleanliness/(urban) sanitation/environmental sanitation/abbr. for 環境衛生|环境卫生[huan2 jing4 wei4 sheng1]
